00032 #ifndef A_OPeNDAPApp_H
00033 #define A_OPeNDAPApp_H

00035 #include <string>
00036 
00037 using std::string ;
00038 
00039 #include "OPeNDAPObj.h"
00040 
00041 class OPeNDAPApp : public OPeNDAPObj
00042 {
00043 protected:
00044     string                      _appName ;
00045     bool                        _debug ;
00046     static OPeNDAPApp *         _theApplication;
00047                                 OPeNDAPApp(void) {};
00048 public:
00049     virtual                     ~OPeNDAPApp() {}
00050     virtual int                 main(int argC, char **argV) = 0;
00051     virtual int                 initialize(int argC, char **argV) = 0;
00052     virtual int                 run(void) = 0;
00053     virtual int                 terminate(int sig = 0) = 0;
00054     string                      appName( void ) { return _appName ; }
00055     bool                        debug( void ) { return _debug ; }
00056     void                        setDebug( bool debug ) { _debug = debug ; }
00057 
00058     static OPeNDAPApp *         TheApplication(void) { return _theApplication; }
00059 };
